modShortDescription: Ragsy ended up with a motorcycle that actually goes quite fast and leans well into long corners and feels a lot better than the current vanilla set up.
modDescription:
After a forum enquiry about the [motorcycle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-motorcycle/) not being able to climb steep inclines and slowing down too much, Ragsy set about trying to improve the vanilla motorcycle handling that was back in A18 first stable release.

Ragsy sort of forgotten about this one and have had this on in his mods folder a while now but he think itâ€™s time to release it as some one may appreciate it.

## Dirt Bike Style

Ragsy ended up with a motorcycle that actually goes quite fast (Turbo top speed 27) and leans well into long corners and feels a lot better than the current vanilla set up.

## Racing Bike Style

Added alternate version or version 2, this version the bike will not slide as much as the Dirt Bike edition and bike leans lower to the ground on cornering.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/Ragsy2145/alpha-19-modlets/-/archive/master/alpha-19-modlets-master.zip?path=Ragsy_Dirtbike_Motorcycle_Physics)** Dirt Bike Style  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/Ragsy2145/alpha-19-modlets/-/archive/master/alpha-19-modlets-master.zip?path=Ragsy_Racing_Motorcycle_Physics)** Racing Bike Style

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/11266-ragsy-s-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Ragsy2145](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/ragsy2145/)
